About Me

I am an MS by Research student at IIT Palakkad, specializing in high-throughput digital circuit design for data-intensive linear algebraic algorithms on ASIC and FPGA platforms. With a strong background in VLSI design, I am passionate about creating efficient hardware architectures for real-time applications.
